```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(highcharter)
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
```



#### Description 

Function to modify the id for the container.

#### Usage
<pre><code>
hc_elementId(hc, id = NULL)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments 

* ``hc ``: A highchart htmlwidget object.
* ``id``: A string

#### Examples
```{r}
hchart(rnorm(10)) %>%
hc_elementId("newid")
```
